comments:
Build: HEAD as of 20071025, 1725 EDT

If you select a repo in either metadata or artifact repositories view, and select delete from the context menu, nothing happens. The repository actually seems to be deleted, but the view doesn't update. If you select the same repo again and click delete, you get:

Minor nit: In the artifact repo view, the action is called "Remove Repositories". The plural form suggests it may be deleting all the repositories. I suggest just calling it "Remove", as it appears in the metadata repo view.

A rough guess is the pb for the UI is to know that a repository has actually been removed. 
Maybe we should look into a notification event for this.
Notification event is faked by the UI, see bug #199806.  I must've broken this recently.
